name: EngineerBabu
description: EngineerBabu is an IT services company, with a committed team. Armed with 250+ Geeks, in three cities in India, Melbourne, Australia. We are specialized in building MVP (minimum viable product) for startups. With our extremely innovative, dedicated & experienced team, we have developed robust & scalable solutions that helped our clients to overcome their hurdles. We have Worked with (350+ Clients ) including reputative Brands like Samsung, YourStory, Frankgreen, IBM. Honeywell, HSBC bank.
features: Working remotely improves the quality of work done by eliminating common office distractions...
The freedom to be productive and have a life outside the office...
Test the waters and take it slow to see whether remote work really works for your company.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Engineers that perform, remotely.
ShortDescription: EngineerBabu helps in Building and managing a tech team.
enhanced_description: EngineerBabu is an IT services company specializing in building and managing remote tech teams, with a particular focus on developing Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for startups. Leveraging a global pool of over 250 'Geeks' across three cities in India and Melbourne, Australia, they deliver robust and scalable solutions. Their services directly support clients' HR objectives by enabling faster and more efficient talent acquisition, boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, and reducing the overall cost of hiring qualified employees. EngineerBabu has a proven track record, having worked with over 350 clients, including reputable brands such as Samsung, IBM, Honeywell, and HSBC Bank.
key_use_cases: Building and managing remote tech teams
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
competitive_advantages: Specialization in building MVPs for startups
Access to a global talent pool of 250+ 'Geeks' across India and Australia
Proven track record with over 350 clients, including large reputable brands
Expertise in developing robust and scalable solutions
Focus on remote team performance and productivity
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Improved quality of work through remote team setups
Development of robust and scalable tech solutions
scalability_features: Ability to provide scalable tech solutions
Leverages a large talent pool (250+ Geeks)
Global operational presence (India, Australia) to scale talent delivery
